title: Maintenance in all servers
body: This message is for all divisions of the bureau.  Starting today, the servers may suffer instability due to the latest maintenance measures.    admin

title: wtf
body: Srsly? If the system is compromised then the FuckingBI is at risk.    b

title: r u ok mate?
body: What a mood. You are fine, right?    E

title: Yea i'm fine
body: Just to scare them off so they dont screw up the intranet at the opera night. Care some bbt?    b
